subject: Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Two online wagering businesses are offering to add $400,000 to the purse of the Beldame Stakes if the Preakness winner Rachel Alexandra and Zenyatta both run.
snippet: Two online wagering businesses are offering to add $400,000 to the purse of the Beldame Stakes if the Preakness winner Rachel Alexandra and Zenyatta both run.
